de.elo.ix.client.imfs

Class PreferencesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.elo.ix.client.imfs.PreferencesHelper

  • public class PreferencesHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to read/write import options to Windows Registry.

      • update

        public static void update(java.lang.Object thisObj,
                          java.util.prefs.Preferences prefs,
                          boolean save)
        Read or write members of the given object.
        Parameters:
        thisObj - Object which members have to be written
        prefs - Preferences object
        save - true, if members should be written. false, if members should be read.
